Title: Authorizes SUNY trustees to lease the historic windmill on the Stonybrook campus to the town of Southampton
Summary: Authorizes SUNY trustees to lease the historic windmill on the Stonybrook campus to the town of Southampton for the purpose of rehabilitating and restoring such windmill; provides that such lease shall be executed within five years of the effective date of this act; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the lease of certain lands located at the State University of New York at Stony Brook
